name: Ray-Ban
description: Ray-Ban is a brand of sunglasses and eyeglasses founded in 1936. Known for iconic styles like Aviator and Wayfarer.

name: Oliver Peoples
description: Oliver Peoples is an American luxury eyewear brand founded in 1987, known for high-quality prescription glasses.

name: Warby Parker
description: Warby Parker offers affordable, stylish eyeglasses and sunglasses with a home try-on program.

name: Zenni
description: Zenni Optical is an online eyewear retailer offering affordable prescription glasses and sunglasses.

name: Tom Ford
description: Tom Ford is a luxury fashion brand offering high-end eyewear and sunglasses.

name: Gucci
description: Gucci is an Italian luxury brand offering designer eyeglasses and sunglasses.

name: Prada
description: Prada is an Italian luxury fashion house known for high-quality eyewear.

name: Versace
description: Versace is an Italian luxury fashion brand offering stylish eyeglasses and sunglasses.

name: Coach
description: Coach is an American luxury fashion brand offering eyewear and accessories.

name: Michael Kors
description: Michael Kors is an American fashion designer brand offering eyeglasses and sunglasses.
